summary: The diff shows modifications to the homepage (Home.tsx) and supporting files, but the diff for Home.tsx is truncated at a critical point. Based on the visible content, the existing hero carousel, why-choose-us section, solutions cards, and metrics are present. However, there is no visible evidence of the two new required sections (Clean Claim Intelligence and Knowledge Board) in the truncated diff. Navigation.tsx mentions adding a 'Clean Claim Intelligence link' to the menu, but this is distinct from adding a dedicated homepage section.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a dedicated section to the homepage highlighting the Clean Claim Intelligence solution with key messaging about the 10-layer validation system and revenue protection benefits
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated Home.tsx diff shows the existing hero carousel, why-choose-us, solutions, and metrics sections, but no new Clean Claim Intelligence section with 10-layer validation messaging is visible. Only a navigation menu link is mentioned in Navigation.tsx, which does not fulfill the requirement for a dedicated homepage section.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a Knowledge Board section to the homepage promoting the hospital licensing and regulatory compliance resources with link to the knowledge board page
missing_requirements.reason: No Knowledge Board section is visible in the truncated Home.tsx diff. The visible content shows only the existing homepage sections without any new Knowledge Board promotional content.
